evaluations.opinion: Ulsanâ€™s selection as a 2025 Asia Rising Startup City reflects its growing startup ecosystem and innovation capacity.

confirmed_facts: Ulsan was selected as a 2025 Asia Rising Startup City by StartupBlink.
Ulsan entered the Global Startup Ecosystem Index for the first time in 2025, ranking 546th.

timeline.event: Ulsan first entered the Global Startup Ecosystem Index (rank 546).
Ulsan declared itself an AI city and announced plans to attract AI data centers.
Ulsan announced its selection as a 2025 Asia Rising Startup City.
